typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as string,
		Total_Revenue as string,
		Total_Sales_Costs as string,
		Total_Net_Revenue as string,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as string,
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Units_Sold as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Sales_Costs as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id_Old as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Sale_Type_Code = Sales_Type,
		Sales_UOM,
		Sales_Point,
		Total_Units_Sold,
		Sales_revenue = Total_Revenue,
		Sales_Cost = Total_Sales_Costs,
		Sales_Net_Revenue = Total_Net_Revenue,
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit,
		Currency_Code,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = Budget_Units_Sold,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Sales_Cost = Budget_Sales_Costs,
		Sales_Type
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelational
